name: Spenda
desc: Developed integrated payments and productivity software, resulting in exponential growth of the company over the tenure of 3+ years, with revenue growth from AUD 2.25 million in FY2022 to AUD 11.08 million in FY2025.

name: Escapekar
desc: Worked on bringing the app interface to the web platform, resulting in an increase in the overall reach of the product.

name: IQVIA
desc: Worked on the IQVIA patient portal, developing a web-based solution for various roles available. Revenue growth from USD 11.36 billion in FY2020 to USD 13.87 billion in FY2021.
